entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 12 March 2023
